post:
It's that time again where I beg you guys to give me money.

I kid. Actually what I want to do is provide you with the quality you've been trolling this site to find. I don't have any fancy SSDs and I'm not aiming for benchmarks that help you pick up ladies in Starbucks…or Fry's. What I have is powerful hardware, above average network, and friendly support.

We just got a new node setup in Dallas and only a few people on it so far. Check this baby out.
2x E5-2620
64GB ECC RAM
8x 500GB HD on LSI MegaRAID 9260-8i (512mb cache, BBU)
1Gbps network

Here's a few results under a container on the Trenta plan.
UnixBench (with 4 cores): 2039.8
UnixBench (with 1 core): 775.2
dd test: 412MB/s (fdatasync, bs=64k count=16k)

A few bandwidth tests via wget:
Cachefly: 81.1MB/s
Linode Atlanta: 14.4MB/s
Linode Dallas: 104MB/s
Linode Tokyo: 6.20MB/s
Linode London: 5.29MB/s
OVH Paris: 11.6MB/s
SmartDC Netherlands: 11.3MB/s
Hetzner Germany: 9.79MB/s
iiNet Australia: 5.43MB/s
Leaseweb Netherlands: 10.8MB/s
Leaseweb VA: 9.37MB/s
Softlayer Singapore: 5.17MB/s
Softlayer San Jose: 31.3MB/s

http://bgp.he.net/AS13354

I'm not going to include all of the same for Lenoir. If you read all that, you're bored, I'm not going to push my luck. Let's just say it is also quite awesome.

Test files:
Dallas: http://192.211.54.101/100mb.test
Lenoir: http://199.241.191.195/100mb.test
